Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): People connectors for Microsoft 365 Copilot
Description:
People connectors for Microsoft 365 Copilot, based on top of Graph connectors, will integrate and enrich people data from various sources into Microsoft 365. This enriched data will enhance experiences in Microsoft 365 Copilot Chat, the profile card, and people search.
More info: https://aka.ms/peopleconnectors
GA date: September CY2025
Preview date: July CY2025
